entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
